Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndiponso inu simudzapembedza chimene ine ndipembedza
Ndipo ine sindidzapembedza chimene inu muli kuchipembedza
Ndipo inu simudzapembedza chimene ine ndimapembedza
Kwa inu chipembedzo chanu ndipo kwa ine chipembedzo changa
